title: Do you even look at this board

replies.body:
> http://img1.ak.crunchyroll.com/i/spire4/e73f4d261e12077680381a25db487d7e1304352178_full.jpg

Must be nice. Working for riot and all that stuff. Cause you know, your servers aren't broken or anything.
Because everyone at Riot does server stuff. Even the accountants. Because that's how companies work. </sarcasm>

This doesn't surprise me.  I'm sure y'all are trying your best to make this awesome.

The thing is, more red activity will breed more positivity.  A lot of people are falling into the "riot doesn't care" mentality out here, which is just as poisonous as it is untrue.

I want to highlight just how bad it is that there is a boards feedback megathread without red responses. For a while mods were actively closing even constructive posts to send them to post in it.  Seriously bad PR.

> Yah

Actually, no you guys don't. Thanks for paying attention to help and support section.

To be fair the general silence in Boards Feedback, even in some of the more neutrally toned threads , is very noticeable. Compounded by the fear of post deletion if the topic the is deemed to go into the mega-thread/wrong board altogether, makes the silence from Reds on this board very perceivable. 

PS: Loved the meme from Zephyeal all the same, even if it doesn't generate a lot of conversation.
lol everyone left. This is personally my first time here since they archived GD, and i wont be coming back
In a word, yes. They do.
